EmailTemplate.name: GAS Order Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Gas Products Order "{!Order_Request__c.Name}" has been rejected by a Branch Chief
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A New Gas Products Order been submitted by {!Order_Request__c.OwnerFirstName} {!Order_Request__c.OwnerLastName} and has been rejected in Branch Chief review.
To access this order, double-click this DocLink: "{!Order_Request__c.Link}
Thank You.
